title: Monster Hordes: Fantasy NPC Creature Sounds
description: Monster Hordes sound pack is an easy solution for games that need voices for various fantasy horror monsters and creatures, without over-complicating things.
longDescription:
This pack draws inspiration from top-view games, where hordes of diverse monsters emerge from all directions, relentlessly pursuing you. Each of the 27 creatures possesses its own distinctive characteristics, featuring three distinct growl variations that can be rotated to prevent repetitive sounds. Additionally, we have included Death, Hurt, and Attack Hit categories, which are universally applicable and can be paired with any creature of your choosing. This versatile format lends itself well to a wide variety of genres.


  • Use DEATH sounds for the monster's demise or critical hit emphasis. Trigger HURT sounds to reflect damage inflicted upon the monster, while ATTACK HIT sounds accompany its strikes against the player.


This product is a part of our affordable Monster Slayer Bundle!
